name: MCP Tool Proxy Agent
description: Proxies AgentVault A2A requests to locally hosted MCP-compliant tool servers.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent (PoC).

skills.name: Execute MCP Tool
skills.description: Executes a specific tool via a configured underlying MCP server.

target_mcp_server_id.description: Logical identifier for the target MCP server (e.g., 'filesystem', 'code-runner'). Must match a key in the proxy's MCP_SERVER_MAP config.

tool_name.description: The fully qualified name of the tool on the target MCP server (e.g., 'filesystem.readFile', 'code.runPython').

arguments.description: Arguments for the tool (structure depends on the tool's inputSchema).

success.description: Indicates if the underlying MCP tool call was successful.

mcp_result.description: The 'result' object from the MCP server response if successful.

error.description: Structured error details if the operation failed.

details.description: Optional additional error context (e.g., raw MCP error).
